title: Ben Simmons Holds Out, Lakers Lineup Options
description:
Brian Windhorst, Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps talk Draymond’s interesting comments, why the latest statements from the 76ers are a win for Ben Simmons, what type of team would trade for Simmons, what the keys are for the Mavs this season, if Anthony Davis will play center this season and how all of the pieces will fit on the Lakers.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, NBA, Brian Windhorst
itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Did The Latest Comments From The 76ers Help Out Ben Simmons?
